global_settings.negative_prompt: blurry, distortion, low quality, bad anatomy, text, watermark, cartoon, unrealistic, deformed limbs

segments.prompt: Hyper-realistic satellite view zooming rapidly down from space towards a green cricket stadium in Bangladesh. The camera transitions from clouds to the green field.
Cinematic medium shot. A Bangladeshi cricketer in a green and red jersey starts his bowling run-up. He looks stiff, cold, and his movement is heavy and awkward.
Dramatic close-up. The bowler suddenly stops mid-run, clutching his hamstring in severe pain. He falls to one knee, grimacing. A subtle red vignette pulses to indicate injury.
3D medical animation. Inside the human leg. Cold, blue, constricted blood vessels suddenly dilate and glow red. Blood rushes through them, warming up the muscle fibers.
Montage. The same cricketer wearing training kit, performing dynamic warm-ups: high knees, leg swings, and lunges on the grass. He is sweating and looks flexible.
Slow motion action shot. The cricketer, now fully warmed up, sprinting in to bowl. His stride is long, fluid, and powerful. The mechanics are perfect.
Low angle impact shot. The bowler releases the ball with maximum speed. He follows through smoothly without any pain. Dust rises from the pitch.
Cinematic medium shot. The bowler celebrating a wicket, high-fiving teammates. He looks healthy, energized, and happy. Golden hour lighting.
